attributes.review: Let’s start off with how whenever I open the app I see annoying orange like I thought this was supposed to be Donald Trumps app. Second, the app is giving off a smell of racism and homophobia. If I were to download an app I wouldn’t want it to wreak. Third, “Make America great again”? No. We have had North Korea wanting to bomb us, saying horrible nasty things to people not of the white race, wanting to ban same sex adoption, and since I got the app, I have had cockroaches ALL OVER my house. Anyways 1 Star.
attributes.title: Very bad app🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I really wanted to get the latest on my president but once I download it, the ground started shaking and out of nowhere a 6ft tall cockroach started chasing me and my mother (who is also a trump supporter) around the house until Mr. Clean showed up and started boxing the cockroach, then Steve from Wii Sports busted through our front door, which caused the cockroach to get distracted and Mr. Clean was able to connect a deadly right hook to the creature’s chin. It folded like a lawn chair and it’s knees caved in. Then Mr. Clean and Steve started boxing 😡 ITS STILL GOING ON AS IM WRITING THIS 😡 DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😡
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD 😡😡

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever!!!! I just came from my trip on tik tok, and I heard you were planing to take it down???? NEVER come for tik tok!!! GEN Z is not going down without a fight you hear me?? If you take down tik tok even more people around the world will start hating you. Except for me, I’ve hated you from the beginning💅🏽 but besides that, over 800 million people own the app. And in 2019 tik tok had 37.2 million users in the US. And by now, 80 million active monthly users in the US. Don’t mess with the app!
attributes.title: BLM!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see what the hype was about. I realized it is actually TRASH just like our president and should be removed from all platforms. The app has so many glitches and just ridiculous. Every time i think of this app i want to burn my phone. I can’t believe this app is still on here. What world do we live in where we let a racist homophobic rapist govern the US. Absolutely not. Not today honey. Plz delete this app and yourself❤️ 
love, a person with an actual heart.
attributes.title: Trash🥰✨

attributes.review: This app has the name of out worse president in history. That’s why I hate it. Honestly I’m starting to think Kayne west would be a better president honestly. Let’s look at the facts. Trump hid in his bunker afraid of his own people. The wall still isn’t finished. More people have lost there jobs in history. Should I continue? Ok. He almost started world war three. Instead of talking to North Korea he decided to say he also had a missile pointed at them. I rest my case. Oh and did I mention he is ORANGE!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app is not helpful AT ALL. The app crashes and glitches like crazy, and it got so bad I had to put my phone in rice. Other than that, this app is just a bunch of spam. It tries to pull you in to their Cheeto cult. First of all, why support a Cheeto? It literally can’t to anything. Second, this Cheeto cult feeds you lies. Third, this specific Cheeto is a racist and a rapist. This app is a way for the head Cheeto to ask for your nudes. Sending nudes to a pedophilic Cheeto is illegal. Please help spread awareness about this Cheeto cult. No good can come from it.
attributes.title: Cheeto Cult

attributes.review: This made my phone go crazy! It was glitching so bad and turning on and off! I had to get my phone fixed and when I got it back nothing changed so I wasted $250!😡 and then I remembered it all started with this stupid app! It took up all my iCloud storage and it somehow got access to my photos and deleted all of them! And then my phone got hacked and now all my information is out! I get random callers and texts😤this is the worst app ever made I hate it!😡😤😒🙄😵
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: I keep getting emails from this app even though I deleted it yesterday because I felt like they were invading my privacy too much🥴I downloaded the app because he is our president not because he is racist, or a horrible president, or a rapist or because how he treats women I mean obviously not. Also I feel like I would like to be able to see more about my husband Barron Yk like #freemymanBarron. So yeah I feel like it’s a horrible app so it deserves a 0/10 🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: It was horrible

attributes.review:

ALL MY FELLOW TRUMPETS👱🏼‍♀️✝️🇺🇸🏖
DO NOT download this app it’s a fake news and was made in CHINA🤢
Please leave a bad review👎🏻so this app will get removed and our dear president Trump will not get backlash for this app that he didn’t create💋
attributes.title: TERRIBLE it’s leftist propaganda🤬

attributes.review:
Words cannot describe the amount of agony I have gone through while downloading this app. All though it has barely been a few minutes, the horrendous  vibes make me want to gouge out my eyeballs with a fork. As someone part of the tide pod eating movement , I would like to say that this is far worse. I hope that someday when I’m far under the earth and deep in my lovely casket no one will ever have to lay eyes on the president or this app again. Farewell lads ✨😪😗😋✌🏻
-generation z
attributes.title: Bleach my eyeballs ✨😗🧿👄🧿
